Text: By the skull I assume you are a trusted loader, but how can you have it up before it aired ?

Two possibilities...either it aired overseas and they snagged one of those (time zone ahead) or someone works at a TV station and they usually send a tape ahead of time in case the satellite goes down mid-broadcast.
looked at the screens, and it seems to be the right one.  However he did it, wow.  Just wow.

Dark_Isle is hilarious. I get all the amusement of seeing people react to spoilers, without actually having to see spoilers.

But it never ceases to amaze me how many people who DON'T WANT TO SEE SPOILERS are yet dumb enough to read the comments.

And I find it especially hilarious the sheer number of morons who start raging at him before they even find out if the spoilers are real or not.

Loads of stupid people provide hours of amusement.
This is the best episode this season so far.
